metadata.description: Official CNCF projects (graduated, incubating, and sandbox)

properties.docker_tags_url: Docker Hub or registry tags URL (requires manual curation)

notes: docker_tags_url field is empty and requires manual curation as this data is not in the CNCF CSV
All projects are open source with active GitHub repositories
Only includes official CNCF projects: graduated (32), incubating (39), and sandbox (164)

cncf_cli_tools.description: GitOps style continuous delivery platform that provides consistent deployment and operations experience for any applications.

cncf_cli_tools.description: The Piraeus Operator manages LINSTOR clusters in Kubernetes.

cncf_cli_tools.name: Pixie
cncf_cli_tools.description: Open source Kubernetes observability for developers.

cncf_cli_tools.name: Podman Container Tools
cncf_cli_tools.description: A set of tools providing full management of container lifecycle, including Podman, Buildah, and Skopeo, which manage containers and images without requiring a daemon or root privileges.

cncf_cli_tools.name: Podman Desktop
cncf_cli_tools.description: An open-source tool for developers to work with containers and Kubernetes with an intuitive and user-friendly interface to effortlessly build, manage,.

cncf_cli_tools.name: Porter
cncf_cli_tools.description: Porter enables you to package your application artifact, client tools, configuration and deployment logic together as an installer that you can distribute, and install with a single command.

cncf_cli_tools.name: Pravega
cncf_cli_tools.description: Pravega - Streaming as a new software defined storage primitive.

cncf_cli_tools.name: Prometheus
cncf_cli_tools.description: Monitoring system and time series database for metrics collection.

cncf_cli_tools.name: Radius
cncf_cli_tools.description: Radius is a cloud-native application platform that enables developers and the platform engineers that support them to collaborate on delivering.

cncf_cli_tools.name: Ratify
cncf_cli_tools.description: A verification engine on Kubernetes which enables verification of artifact security metadata and admits for deployment only those that comply with policies you create.

cncf_cli_tools.name: rkt
cncf_cli_tools.description: [Project ended] rkt is a pod-native container engine for Linux.

cncf_cli_tools.name: Rook
cncf_cli_tools.description: Rook is an open source cloud-native storage orchestrator for Kubernetes, providing the platform, framework, and support for Ceph storage to natively integrate with Kubernetes.

cncf_cli_tools.name: Runme Notebooks
cncf_cli_tools.description: A toolchain that turns Markdown into interactive, cloud-native, runnable Notebook experiences for DevOps.

cncf_cli_tools.name: SchemaHero
cncf_cli_tools.description: A Kubernetes operator for declarative database schema management (gitops for database schemas).

cncf_cli_tools.name: Score
cncf_cli_tools.description: Score is an open-source workload specification designed to simplify development for cloud-native developers.

cncf_cli_tools.name: sealer
cncf_cli_tools.description: Build, Share and Run Both Your Kubernetes Cluster and Distributed Applications (Project under CNCF).

cncf_cli_tools.name: Sermant
cncf_cli_tools.description: Sermant a proxyless service mesh solution based on Javaagent.

cncf_cli_tools.name: Serverless Devs
cncf_cli_tools.description: :fire: Serverless Devs: Serverless developer tool ( Serverless Devs: Serverless 开发者工具 ).

cncf_cli_tools.name: Serverless Workflow
cncf_cli_tools.description: Contains the official specification for the Serverless Workflow Domain Specific Language.

cncf_cli_tools.name: Service Mesh Interface (SMI)
cncf_cli_tools.description: The Service Mesh Interface (SMI) is a specification for service meshes, with a focus on those that run on Kubernetes.

cncf_cli_tools.name: Service Mesh Performance
cncf_cli_tools.description: Standard for measuring and characterizing service mesh performance, providing objective metrics and benchmarks.

cncf_cli_tools.name: Shipwright
cncf_cli_tools.description: Shipwright - a framework for building container images on Kubernetes.

cncf_cli_tools.name: Skooner
cncf_cli_tools.description: Simple Kubernetes real-time dashboard and management.

cncf_cli_tools.name: SlimFaaS
cncf_cli_tools.description: Lightweight, fast Function as a Service platform for running serverless functions on Kubernetes with minimal overhead.

cncf_cli_tools.name: SlimToolkit
cncf_cli_tools.description: Container optimization tool - automatically analyzes, minifies, and secures container images by removing unnecessary components.

cncf_cli_tools.name: SOPS
cncf_cli_tools.description: Sops is an editor of encrypted files that supports YAML, JSON, ENV, INI and BINARY formats and encrypts with AWS KMS, GCP KMS, Azure Key Vault, age, and PGP.

cncf_cli_tools.name: Spiderpool
cncf_cli_tools.description: Spiderpool is the underlay and RDMA network solution of the Kubernetes, for bare metal, VM and public cloud.

cncf_cli_tools.name: SPIFFE
cncf_cli_tools.description: SPIFFE is a graduated project of the Cloud Native Computing Foundation (CNCF).

cncf_cli_tools.name: Spin
cncf_cli_tools.description: Spin is a framework for building and deploying serverless applications in WebAssembly.

cncf_cli_tools.name: SpinKube
cncf_cli_tools.description: Open source platform for efficiently running (containerless) Spin-based WebAssembly (Wasm) applications on Kubernetes.

cncf_cli_tools.name: SPIRE
cncf_cli_tools.description: SPIRE (the SPIFFE Runtime Environment) is a toolchain of APIs for establishing trust between software systems across a wide variety of hosting platforms.

cncf_cli_tools.name: Stacker
cncf_cli_tools.description: Stacker is a tool for building OCI images and related artifacts such as SBOMs natively via a declarative yaml format.

cncf_cli_tools.name: Strimzi
cncf_cli_tools.description: Strimzi provides a way to run an [Apache Kafka®][kafka] cluster on [Kubernetes][k8s] or [OpenShift][os] in various deployment configurations.

cncf_cli_tools.description: Submariner enables direct networking between Pods and Services in different Kubernetes clusters, either on-premises or in the cloud.

cncf_cli_tools.name: SuperEdge

cncf_cli_tools.name: Telepresence
cncf_cli_tools.description: Local development against a remote Kubernetes or OpenShift cluster.

cncf_cli_tools.name: Tetragon

cncf_cli_tools.name: Thanos
cncf_cli_tools.description: Highly available Prometheus setup with long term storage capabilities.

cncf_cli_tools.name: The Update Framework (TUF)
cncf_cli_tools.description: Python reference implementation of The Update Framework (TUF).

cncf_cli_tools.name: TiKV

cncf_cli_tools.name: Tokenetes
cncf_cli_tools.description: Tokenetes implements Transaction Tokens (TraTs) for microservices call chains.

cncf_cli_tools.name: Traefik Mesh
cncf_cli_tools.description: Traefik Mesh is a simple, yet full-featured service mesh.

cncf_cli_tools.name: Tremor
cncf_cli_tools.description: In short, Tremor is an event- or stream-processing system.

cncf_cli_tools.name: Trickster
cncf_cli_tools.description: Open Source HTTP Reverse Proxy Cache and Time Series Dashboard Accelerator.

cncf_cli_tools.name: urunc

cncf_cli_tools.name: Vineyard
cncf_cli_tools.description: Vineyard (v6d) is an in-memory immutable data manager.

cncf_cli_tools.name: Virtual Kubelet
cncf_cli_tools.description: Virtual Kubelet is an open source Kubernetes kubelet implementation.

cncf_cli_tools.name: Visual Studio Code Kubernetes Tools
cncf_cli_tools.description: The extension for developers building applications to run in Kubernetes clusters and for DevOps staff troubleshooting Kubernetes applications.

cncf_cli_tools.name: Vitess
cncf_cli_tools.description: MySQL-compatible, horizontally scalable, cloud-native database solution.

cncf_cli_tools.name: Volcano
cncf_cli_tools.description: Cloud native batch computing system for Kubernetes - manages high-performance workloads like AI/ML, big data, and HPC jobs.

cncf_cli_tools.name: wasmCloud

cncf_cli_tools.name: WasmEdge Runtime
cncf_cli_tools.description: WasmEdge is a lightweight, high-performance, and extensible WebAssembly runtime for cloud native, edge, and decentralized applications.

cncf_cli_tools.name: werf
cncf_cli_tools.description: Werf is a solution for implementing efficient and consistent software delivery to Kubernetes.

cncf_cli_tools.name: Xline
cncf_cli_tools.description: Xline is a high-performance geo-distributed metadata management system, which is compatible with the ETCD interface.

cncf_cli_tools.name: xRegistry
cncf_cli_tools.description: The xRegistry project defines an abstract model for managing metadata about resources and provides a REST-based interface to discover, create, modify and delete those resources.

cncf_cli_tools.name: youki
cncf_cli_tools.description: Youki is an implementation of the OCI runtime-spec in Rust, similar to runc.

cncf_cli_tools.name: zot
